column1: table #:  6 Percent distribution of justice system payrolls by State and type of government, March 2001
series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts 2001, NCJ 202792
data source:  Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (CJEE)
Table 6.   Percent distribution of justice system payrolls by State and type of government, March 2001
Notes: March payroll data may not sum to total because of rounding. Local government data are estimates subject to variability.

a/ Total March payroll includes payrolls of States and all types of local governments including independent school districts, which are not displayed separately.  The "Local, total" lines, which include these districts, will not equal the
b/ Justice system payrolls of independent school districts and special districts (primarily for special police forces) are not available.
